resources.string: Do you want to delete the user?

Welcome to "PagoYo". App created by JSenen for the loyalty of customers of a bar. Through the app we can add customers, assigning them an amount of coffee or lunch drinks. or lunch. If not by default will assign the amount of 10. Each time the customer consumes, we will click on the icon corrspondiente and when the number of the indicated number of drinks, it will show us the prize to give him the next gift. The number of days to receive the prize is of 10 days by default from the moment it is obtained, then it will be automatically eliminated.
